home.title: Dashboard
home.description: Welcome to your personal finance management dashboard
home.quickStatsDescription: Your financial overview at a glance
home.quickStatsEmpty: Stats will appear here once you start tracking your finances.
home.budgetSummaryEmpty: Create budgets to track your spending.
home.goalsEmpty: Set and track your financial goals.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.yourAccountsDescription: All your financial accounts in one place
accounts.noAccounts: No accounts yet. Click "Add New Account" to create one.
accounts.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the account

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Organize your transactions with custom categories
categories.noExpense: No expense categories yet. Click "Add Category" to create one.
categories.noSaving: No saving categories yet. Click "Add Category" to create one.
categories.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the category

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.noExpensesDescription: Click "Add Expense" to record your first transaction
expenses.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.
expenses.requiredFields: Please provide all required fields: amount, category, and account
expenses.noSpendingData: No spending data available for this month
expenses.noIncomeForSankey: No income data available for this month
expenses.noExpensesForSankey: No expenses data available for this month
expenses.noFlowData: No flow data available. Income and expenses must use the same accounts.

incomes.title: Incomes
incomes.description: Track and manage your income sources
incomes.noIncomesDescription: Click "Add Income" to record your first transaction
incomes.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this income? This action cannot be undone.

budgets.title: Budgets
budgets.description: Plan your monthly spending and savings
budgets.selectMonthDescription: Choose the month you want to budget for
budgets.selectAccountDescription: Choose which account you want to budget for
budgets.noAccountsDescription: Create an account first to start budgeting
budgets.noCategoriesDescription: Create categories first to start budgeting
budgets.noIncomeDescription: Record income for this month to start budgeting
budgets.discardChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
budgets.validationError: Please fix validation errors before saving
budgets.budgetExceedsIncome: Total budget exceeds available income by

comparison.noIncome: No income recorded for this month
comparison.noTransactions: No transactions recorded for this month

savings.title: Savings
savings.monthlyDepositsDescription: Amount deposited in each savings category per month
savings.accumulatedSavingsDescription: Total savings accumulated over time for each category
savings.categorySavingsDescription: Monthly deposits and accumulated savings over time
savings.noSavingsDataDescription: Start saving to see your progress here
